radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Unchanged 4-mm left lower lobe nodule; normal liver without focal lesions; multiple likely simple cysts; mild central biliary ductal dilatation; gallbladder distended with slight pericholecystic fluid; atrophic pancreas with minimal peripancreatic stranding; no free air or fluid in abdomen; post-surgical changes in rectum; advanced degenerative changes at L2-3 level.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Unchanged 4-mm left lower lobe nodule; advanced degenerative changes at L2-3 noted as compatible with recent history of osteomyelitis and discitis.
